fr.xephi.authme.service

Class TeleportationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.xephi.authme.service.TeleportationService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Reloadable

    public class TeleportationService
extends Object
implements Reloadable
    Handles teleportation (placement of player to spawn).

    • Method Summary

      Teleports the player according to the settings when he joins.
      void teleportOnLogin(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, PlayerAuth auth, LimboPlayer limbo)
      Teleports the player according to the settings after having successfully logged in.
